info: LifeStance Health Group, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides outpatient mental health services. It offers patients a suite of mental health services, including psychiatric evaluations and treatment, psychological, and neuropsychological testing, as well as individual, family, and group therapy. It treats a range of mental health conditions, including anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, eating disorders, psychotic disorders, and post-traumatic stress disorder. The company offers patients care virtually through its online delivery platform or in-person at its centers in 31 states. LifeStance Health Group, Inc. was founded in 2017 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.
